output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(GAMUT)
library(knitr)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```


```{r summary data}
load("GAMUT.Rdata")

program <- "Akron Childrens"

measure_overview <- data.frame()

for(i in metric_data$measure_id) {
        
        mydata <- 
                measure_summary(i, program) %>% data.frame()
        
        measure_overview <- bind_rows(measure_overview, mydata)
}

kable(measure_overview)


```
